name: MACLIVAN 250 MG/5 ML
treatmentDescriptions: Maclivan is indicated for the treatment of the following infections in adults and children :• Acute bacterial sinusitis (adequately diagnosed)• Acute otitis media• Acute exacerbations of chronic bronchitis (adequately diagnosed)• Community acquired pneumonia• Cystitis• Pyelonephritis• Skin and soft tissue infections in particular cellulitis, animal bites, severe dental abscess with spreading cellulitis.• Bone and joint infections, in particular osteomyelitis.
ingredients: CLAVULANIC ACID AS POTASSIUM 62.5  MG /, AMOXICILLIN AS TRIHYDRATE/

packaging.name: MACLIVAN 400 MG+57 MG/5 ML POWDER FOR SUSP 35 ML
